original: Ludvigson, Ivan Robert, direktör, Kinna, f. 31/8/94 i Kinna, Älvsb. 1., av fabr. Ludvig Svensson o. Goda Svensson. G. 25 m. Olga Samuelsson. Barn: Ivan Ludvig f. 28, Sten Ivan 32. — Stud:ex. i Lund 15. Anst. i faderns firma is. å., prokurist 19, disp. 24 o. verkst. dir. f. A-B Ludvig Svensson i Kinna sed. 28. Ordf. i styr. f. A-B Kinna Teater o. Konserthus o. Kinna idr :platsfören., v. ordf. i Kinna kom-m:nd, kassaförvalt. i generalskan von Alten Bockums donation, led. av -styr. f. Gbgs Hand:ban’ks avd:kont. i Kinna, led. av Västergötl. o. N. Hall. hand:kamm. samt av munic:fullm. o. kyrkofullm. m. m. Hobby: hästsport.
translated: Ludvigson, Ivan Robert, director, Kinna, born on 31/8/94 in Kinna, Älvsborg County, son of manufacturer Ludvig Svensson and Goda Svensson. Married on 25 with Olga Samuelsson. Children: Ivan Ludvig born in 1928, Sten Ivan born in 1932. Graduated from Lund University in 1915. Employed in father's company the same year, became assistant manager in 1919, assistant manager in 1924, and managing director of A-B Ludvig Svensson in Kinna since 1928. Chairman of the board of A-B Kinna Theater and Concert Hall, and Kinna sports association. Vice chairman of Kinna municipal council, treasurer of the von Alten Bockums donation, member of the board of Gothenburg Handbank's branch office in Kinna, member of the West Gothia and North Halland Chamber of Commerce, municipal representative, church representative, among others. Hobby: equestrian sports.
